Posts.Content: Try not to worry, that's hard I know. Do not try guessing what might be or not. You will have to be patient till you see him. How long till your appointment. They can 're call you for all sorts of things. Let us know how you get on and fingers crossed for a good outcome. Report
Posts.Title: Mammogram re-call

Posts.Content: Thanks Janet my appointment is 9.am Monday, so it is going to be a long weekend, cancelled everything I had planned, I'm the type of personality that wants to hideaway! i can't feel any lumps, so fingers crossed that IF they have found something, then it will be early stages. Report
Posts.Title: Mammogram re-call

Posts.Content: Hi, I have just had my mammogram as I am 50, have had private ones in the past and all come back clear. However, this letter doesn't say anything about further tests or mammograms, just that the doctor is going to discuss the films and do a breast examination. Â I am really worried, any advice would be appreciated. 2 likes, 7 replies Report 2
